infotexts.entitydescription.io_toolbox: This box can be marked with the item inside. Can store up to 1024+16 units of marked material. It automatically maintains 8 materials usable by connected fabricator. Condition of this item indicates spare capacity. Unmark button works only when this is empty(full-condition).
infotexts.entitydescription.mio_safestoragecrate: Made of aluminum and rubber, waterproof, fireproof.
